New Records: Argentina won the 2024 Copa América title, breaking a record for their 16th Copa América win
Key Match Events: Lautaro Martínez scored a goal in the 112th minute to give Argentina a 1-0 lead over Colombia
Giovani Lo Celso made an assist for Lautaro Martínez's goal
Lionel Messi left the game with an injury
Pre-Game Insights: Argentina was favored to win based on their current form
Colombia had a red-hot run leading up to the final
Post-Match Reflections: Lionel Messi cried uncontrollably after exiting the game with an injury
Argentina's victory was a record-setting 16th Copa América win
Lionel Messi put his appreciation for his teammates and fans on Instagram after the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The over/under was 1.5 and the teams scored 1 goal, so people who bet the under won
The over/under odds were not specified
Argentina won at +115 odds so a bet of $100 won $215 total
